name: Lima Surf Tour
description: In the last 10 years, the sport of surfing has grown significantly in Peru. Today, we have world champions like  Sofia Mulanovich and Gabriel Villaran, Cristobal de Col and others and our participation in world tournaments is common.  If you love this sport, this tour will allow you to visit the best beaches in Lima where the surfing sport is practiced, and we can also give you the opportunity to learn and practiced it.
